title: Detached house for sale in Real de Zaragoza
description:
Welcome to an exquisite villa built at the end of 2021, ideally situated just a short walk from the sea in the prestigious Hacienda Las Chapas, Marbella East. This modern property combines luxury, functionality, and cutting-edge design, making it a perfect choice for year-round living or a lucrative investment for short-term rentals.
Upon entering the villa, you are greeted by an elegant entrance hall that sets the tone for the sophisticated interiors. The ground floor features a guest toilet for convenience. The living room is a masterpiece of contemporary design, with sliding windows that seamlessly disappear into the walls, creating a fluid transition between indoor and outdoor spaces. This open-plan area is perfect for both relaxation and entertaining, offering a sense of openness and connection to the lush surroundings.
The large kitchen is a culinary dream, equipped with a central island that provides ample space for meal preparation and casual dining. Adjacent to the kitchen is the dining room, which offers direct access to a spacious terrace. This outdoor area is ideal for alfresco dining, taking advantage of the mild Marbella climate. Additionally, the ground floor includes a pantry and a laundry room, ensuring all practical needs are met with ease. The barbecue area and garden access further enhance the outdoor living experience, making it perfect for hosting gatherings and enjoying outdoor meals.
The first floor is dedicated to four en-suite bedrooms, providing privacy and comfort for all occupants. Two of these bedrooms share access to a large terrace, offering a serene space to enjoy the views and fresh air. The master bedroom is a luxurious retreat, featuring its own expansive terrace, ideal for private relaxation and soaking in the surrounding beauty.
The basement level of the villa is designed to cater to a variety of needs and preferences. It includes a garage with space for approximately four cars, a storage room, and a heated indoor pool area. This space is perfect for year-round swimming and relaxation and has ample room to install a sauna and Turkish bath for a complete spa experience. Additionally, there is a versatile room that can be used as a gym or converted into an extra en-suite bedroom, providing flexibility to suit your lifestyle.
The exterior of the property is equally impressive, featuring a stunning saltwater infinity pool that overlooks the garden. Both the front and back gardens are meticulously landscaped, creating a serene and picturesque environment. The villa is equipped with modern amenities such as solar panels, underfloor heating, and air conditioning, ensuring comfort and sustainability. There is also pre-installation for a lift, enhancing accessibility and convenience.
This villa offers the perfect blend of luxury, comfort, and modern living. Its prime location in Hacienda Las Chapas, combined with its proximity to the sea, makes it an exceptional opportunity for discerning buyers. Whether you are looking for a permanent residence or an investment property, this villa is designed to meet all your needs and exceed your expectations. Experience the best of Marbella living in this stunning, contemporary home.

Basic features: Parking space included in the price

title: Terraced house for sale in Las Lomas de Río Verde
description: Beautifully renovated beachside townhouse with superb sea views in one of the most privileged locations on the Golden Mile. Situated in Coral Beach, one of the most sought after complexes with beautiful gardens and pools. Just a few metres from the beach with its own private garden, this townhouse has been completely renovated to high standards. It is the second house from the beach and it is distributed over 3 levels and south-west facing, enjoying the afternoon sun, it has lots of natural light and wonderful sea views. The entrance level has a very comfortable living and dining area with a fireplace opening on to the partly private garden and communal ground, modern designer kitchen and a guest toilet. On the first level there are 3 bedrooms, one of which is en-suite and the other two share a bathroom. Terrace overlooking the sea and communal gardens. The entire upper level is occupied by the master suite with a stunning make up / desk with sea views steam fireplace, en-suite bathroom with a steam sauna, and terrace with incredible sea views. The house is exquisitely decorated and offered fully furnished. Features include: smart home system and under-floor heating by water, porcelain floors and airzone air-conditioning. A unique property that rarely comes to the market. Walking distance to Puente Romano and Puerto Banús.

Basic features: Parking space included in the price

title: Terraced house for sale in Urbanización Marbella Hill Club
description:
Classic Style Semi - Detached Villa for Renovation in Marbella Hill Club We are excited to introduce you to this charming semi-detached villa nestled in a quiet cul de sac, offering loads of privacy. This Andalusian-style gem is a rare find, located within an esteemed gated community of the Golden Mile in Marbella. 
This property presents an exciting renovation opportunity, allowing you to bring your creative vision to life and craft a personalised haven that reflects your style. Upon entry, a spacious living and dining area, complete with a charming fireplace, welcomes you with a cosy ambiance. 
Enter the tranquil outdoor space featuring a generous pool and a spacious covered terrace with a bar, perfect for relaxation. On the ground floor you also find a separate kitchen, conveniently connected to the rear patio and an office which could be used as a fourth bedroom as well as a separate bathroom. 
The upper floor comprises a generously sized master bedroom with an ensuite bathroom. From there you access a delightful terrace with open green views and a hint of sea views. The presence of a Jacuzzi bathtub adds to the appeal. 
Two additional bedrooms share a bathroom, accommodating family and guests. Additionally, there is a separate garage for one car, as well as two storage rooms, solar panels and air conditioning in every room. 
This semi-detached villa feels like a detached villa and is a testament to refined living in Marbella's prestigious Golden Mile. Its blend of privacy, charm, and scenic beauty makes a perfect foundation to create your own unique living experience. 
For more details or to schedule a viewing, please reach out to us. Explore the potential of this Marbella gem today. Marbella Hill Club is one of the most established and sought after communities in Marbella, situated on the hillside bellow the Sierra Blanca hills and within a few minutes’ drive to Marbella centre and the beach. Marbella Hill Club was developed by the founder of ‘families of Marbella’; the area was selected for their private residences due to the proximity to Marbella’s centre and the tranquillity of the area, surrounded by green, peaceful nature. In general, the properties in Marbella Hill Club offer fantastic views to the coastline as well as breathtaking mountain views. Villas in the area enjoy high demand; however, properties don’t come often into the market. You can find apartments in the popular ‘Jardines Colgantes’ an apartment complex with large apartments, each with its own swimming pool and very spacious terraces with spectacular views. In recent years a few new developments have been built in the area such as Montebello, a gated community of high-quality apartments and Marbella Hill Village, which offer a selection of attractive townhouses.
